tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE user_sessions (session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, login_time TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id));

CREATE TABLE addresses ( 
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id), 
  country VARCHAR(50), 
  city VARCHAR(50), 
  postal_code VARCHAR(10) 
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    birthdate DATE,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_settings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    theme VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'light',
    notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE password_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    old_password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    change_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
